description: The speed limit in built-up areas on the Isle of Man could be lowered after members backed the move.
title: Isle of Man speed limit: Tynwald backs 20mph residential roads plan
title_page: Isle of Man speed limit: Tynwald backs 20mph residential roads plan - BBC News
maintext: Backing the change to his own amendment, he said the new proposal combined the "principles of safety" with those of "liveability" and provided "a really good building block" to move forward from while still allowing "some discretion".
